data.text: A mato, mangana nde mangayaan nabama nɛn tinxinni,
E muxune birin luma nɛn
Yɛɛ kanne yɛɛne mi fa luma raxixi,
Muxun naxanye xaxili mi dɔxi,
Nayi, a mi fa falama xaxilitarene ma a xaxilimane,
Amasɔtɔ xaxilitaren xaxilitareya falan nan tima.
Fe ɲaxi rabane wanle ɲaxu.
Koni muxu faɲine fe faɲine nan yitɔnma
Ɛ tan ɲaxanla naxanye luxi xaxili sani,
Benun ɲɛɛ keden e nun nde,
Nayi, ɛ gaxu,
Ɛ kanken makudun, ɛ wuga
e nun n ma yamana bɔxɔna,
Amasɔtɔ manga banxin nabeɲinma nɛn,
han Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin yi godo nxu ma keli kore,
Nayi, kiti kɛndɛn luma nɛn tonbonni,
Tinxinyaan yi bɔɲɛ xunbenla raso.
N ma yamaan dɔxɔma nɛn bɔɲɛ xunbeli yireni,
Hali balabalan kɛsɛne fɔtɔnna kalama nɛn,
sɛwan luma nɛn ɛ tan xa.
